word:
Counsel to Those Who Have Grown Gray 
                        in Service 


        A Caution to Elder S. N. Haskell 


     While you are anxious to do all that you possibly can, remember, Elder Haskell, that it is only by the great mercy and grace of God that you have been spared these many years to bear your testimony. Do not take upon yourself loads that others who are younger can carry.
